name: Urban Forager
text: You are skilled at keeping yourself and others safe in the alleys, sewers, and underbellies of cities.
benefit: You may use the Survival skill to forage and track in urban locations using the table below.<table class="inner"><tr><td>
text_zh: 你精于在小巷，下水道以及城市的其它角落保护自己和别人。
prerequisites_zh: 知识（本地）1级，生存1级，生存1级，追迹。
benefit_zh: 你可以使用生存技能在城市中追踪或者觅食。
